itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Lumbering trees grown in every region.

item.name: Old Fishing Rod
item.desc: A Gathering Tool made for catching fish in rivers or oceans.

item.name: Usable Scantling
item.desc: Timber required for Construction.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Logs received from trees Lumbered in any region.

item.name: Intermediate Cooking Utensil
item.desc: An medium-grade tool used for Cooking.\n- It can be installed in a residence.

item.name: Intermediate Alchemy Tool
item.desc: A tool that can reconstruct the components in a substance.\n- It can be installed in a residence.

item.name: Waterway
item.desc: Installing a Waterway in a Garden will reduce the amount of water consumed.\n(Right-click to display the closest Fence Exchange location)

item.name: Scarecrow
item.desc: Installing a Scarecrow in a Garden will decrease the rate of bird attacks.\n(Right-click to display the closest Fence Exchange location)

item.name: Ship License: Raft
item.desc:
Proof of ownership of a at the Wharf.
- Inventory Slot(s): 4, Acceleration: 100%, Speed: 100%, Turn: 100%, Braking: 100%
It can be used after reaching Lv.8.

※ Using a Ship License
 1. Right-click the Ship License and move to the designated Wharf.
 2. Talk to the Ferry Crossing Keeper and select the Wharf menu.
 3. Click on the Register Ship menu and right-click on the Ship License.
 4. Enter the ship’s name and push Confirm to register the ship.
 5. Select the registered ship and click on the Find menu.
